Luckily, the hot tub is right outside your private entrance. That makes it an easy trip from the private, outdoor tub to one of the two leather sofas inside in front of the large screen LED TV. If you do want to explore, you can easily get to Co Springs, Trinidad, the Royal Gorge, or Canon City. If you want a longer day-trip, check out the Great Sand Dunes or the South Park Brewery.
